name: Geisha Gauntlet
description:
This game for the Extra Credit Game Jam 5 was inspired by a painting I dreamed of about 5 years ago depicting a demon eating an orange with his ear.   I thought he would make a great guardian of the way, and a geisha suited to be the traveler.

Control the geisha by clicking her hands or head.  You'll have to find out clues to safety by the note she carries.  Good luck getting home!
